resources.string: Acceleration due to gravity in the x-axis : %s m/s^2 \n
Acceleration due to gravity in the y-axis : %s m/s^2 \n
Acceleration due to gravity in the z-axis : %s m/s^2 \n
You are %s degrees off of the horizontal
Welcome! From five feet away from the object, please click a picture!
Great! Now take two steps along a path around the object and click a picture. If you already reached where you started, you are done!
Excellent! From where you are, please click a picture to cover the other %s circles
Number of pictures from a single position
Must be an odd integer that is a perfect square greater than 1
Must be a integer between (inclusive) 10 and 100
A decimal value greater than or equal to 0 but less than 1
A decimal value greater than 0 and less than 360
